<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109657</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109657</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflection of waves in a ripple tank</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion der Wellen in einem 
Kräuselungbehälter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion des vagues dans un réservoir 
d'ondulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão das ondas em um tanque do ripple</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione delle onde in un carro armato 
dell'ondulazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση των κυμάτων σε μια δεξαμενή κυματώσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión de ondas en un tanque de la 
ondulación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the reflected waves from plane waves reflected from a 45 degree barrier (top), a concave barrier (middle) and a convex barrier (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">concave barriers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convex barriers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plane waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ripple tank</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavefronts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen die reflektierten Wellen
von den flachen Wellen, die von einer 45-Grad-Sperre (Oberseite) 
reflektiert werden, von einer konkaven Sperre (mittlere) und von einer
konvexen Sperre (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent les vagues reflétées
des ondes planes reflétées d'une barrière de 45 degrés (dessus), 
d'une barrière concave (moyenne) et d'une barrière convexe (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram as ondas refletidas 
das ondas planas refletidas de uma barreira de 45 graus (alto), de uma
barreira côncava (média) e de uma barreira convexa (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano le onde riflesse 
dalle onde piane riflesse da una barriera da 45 gradi (parte 
superiore), da una barriera concava (centrale) e da una barriera 
convessa (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν απεικονισμένα κύματα
από τα επίπεδα κύματα που απεικονίζονται από ένα εμπόδιο 45 
βαθμού (κορυφή), ένα κοίλο εμπόδιο (μέση) και ένα κυρτό 
εμπόδιο (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran las ondas reflejadas
de las ondas planas reflejadas de una barrera de 45 grados (tapa), de 
una barrera cóncava (media) y de una barrera convexa (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konkave Sperren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konvexe Sperren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flache Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräuselungbehälter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wavefronts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tanque do ripple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
